Name: Battery Charging 4.5.3.5
checklistText:
<size=21>4.5.3.5Battery Charging</size>

Panel 5		MN BUS TIE (2) 					- OFF
Panel 250	cb PYRO A & B BAT BUS A & B (2) - open
			cb BAT c TO BAT BUS A & B 	- open
Panel 5		cb BAT RLY BUS BAT A (B) 		- open
Panel 3		DC IND sel 						- BAT CHGR
			BAT CHG 						- A, B, or C

				CAUTION
		If bat chg is started immediately after discharge, chgr current 
		may be high &/or chgr voltage may be low. Current & voltage 
		should be within specified limits 45 min after initiation of chg, 
		otherwise trnfr chgr to remaining bats. After remaining bats 
		are charged, return chgr to affected bat.

			DC VOLTS ind 					- 37.5-39.5 vdc
			BAT CHG 						- OFF (at MSFN request or 
											when DC VOLTS ind reads 39.5 
											vdc for bat bus A, B or C)
Panel 5		cb BAT RLY BUS BAT A (B) 		- close
Panel 3		DC IND sel 						- MNA
Panel 101	SYS TEST (2) 					- 7A
				SYS TEST ind 				- <1.5 vdc
				(After sea level amb press â‰ˆ14 psia has been vented)
			If >1.5 vdc
Panel 252		BAT VENT vlv 				- VENT (for 5 sec) then CLOSE
Panel 101	SYS TEST (2) 					- 5B
